trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when fails the process/request to load the outgoing shared items.

trans-unit.source: If you agree, the current account will be logged out and all Offline data will be erased. Do you want to continue?
trans-unit.target: Si vous acceptez, le compte actuel sera déconnecté et toutes les données Hors ligne seront effacées. Voulez-vous poursuivre?
trans-unit.note: Message of the warning dialog shown when you try to confirm an account but you are logged in with another one.

trans-unit.source: You are logged in with another account
trans-unit.target: Vous êtes connecté avec un autre compte
trans-unit.note: Title of the warning dialog shown when you try to confirm an account but you are logged in with another one - (String as short as possible).

trans-unit.source: To access this folder/file, you will need its Decryption key. If you do not have the key, contact the creator of the link.
trans-unit.target: Afin d'accéder à ce dossier/fichier, il vous faudra sa clé de déchiffrement. Si vous ne possédez pas la clé, veuillez contacter le créateur du lien.
trans-unit.note: Alert message shown when you tap on a encrypted file/folder link that can't be opened because it doesn't include the key to see its contents.

trans-unit.target: Saisir la clé de déchiffrement
trans-unit.note: Alert title shown when you tap on a encrypted file/folder link that can't be opened because it doesn't include the key to see its contents - (String as short as possible).

trans-unit.target: Clé de déchiffrement invalide
trans-unit.note: Alert title shown when you have written a decryption key not valid - (String as short as possible).

trans-unit.source: This could be due to the following reasons: - The file has been removed because of a ToS/AUP violation. - Invalid URL – the link you are trying to access does not exist. - The file has been deleted by the user.
trans-unit.target: Cela pourrait être causé par les raisons suivantes : - Le fichier a été retiré à cause d'une violation des conditions générales d'utilisation ou de la politique d'utilisation acceptable. - L'URL est invalide. Le lien auquel vous essayez d'accéder n'existe pas. - Le fichier a été supprimé par l'utilisateur.
trans-unit.note: Error message shown when you open a file link and it's no longer available. It explains the reasons that could be causing it. Keep "\n"

trans-unit.source: This could be due to the following reasons: - The folder link has been removed because of a ToS/AUP violation. - Invalid URL – the link you are trying to access does not exist. - The folder link has been deleted by the user.
trans-unit.target: Cela pourrait être causé par les raisons suivantes : - Le lien de dossier a été retiré à cause d'une violation des conditions générales d'utilisation ou de la politique d'utilisation acceptable. - L'URL est invalide. Le lien auquel vous essayez d'accéder n'existe pas. - Le lien de dossier a été supprimé par l'utilisateur.
trans-unit.note: Error message shown when a folder link doesn't exist. Keep "\n"

trans-unit.target: Lien non disponible
trans-unit.note: Error title shown when you open a file or folder link and it's no longer available - (String as short as possible).

trans-unit.note: Alert title shown when the DEBUG mode is enabled - (String as short as possible).

trans-unit.source: Debug mode is enabled. Do you want to disable it?
trans-unit.target: Le mode débogage est activé. Voulez-vous le désactiver?
trans-unit.note: Message of the alert dialog displayed when the app starts and the DEBUG mode is enable. This alert is to try to avoid that the user forget disable the DEBUG mode and the log file size grows a lot in the offline section.

trans-unit.note: Message of the alert dialog displayed when the app starts and the DEBUG mode is enable - (String as short as possible).

trans-unit.source: Your purchase of a MEGA subscription has failed because you have already purchased this item.
trans-unit.target: L'achat de votre abonnement à MEGA a échoué, car vous avez déjà acheté cet article.
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when a user already has purchased an item from the store

trans-unit.source: Your purchase of a MEGA subscription has failed or has been cancelled. Please try again or contact Windows Store support.
trans-unit.target: L'achat de votre abonnement à MEGA a échoué ou a été annulé. Veuillez ressayer ou contacter l'assistance de la logithèque Windows Store.
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when a user tries to purchase an item from the store and it failed

trans-unit.source: Your purchase of a MEGA subscription has not passed validation at our licence server. On restart of this app we will retry to validate your subscription licences. Please contact MEGA support if the error continues.
trans-unit.target: Votre achat d'un abonnement MEGA n'a pas été validé par notre serveur de licences. Lors du redémarrage de cette appli, nous retenterons de valider vos licences d'abonnement. Veuillez contacter l'assistance MEGA si l'erreur persiste.
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed in cases that validation of the IAP purchase has failed at the MEGA License server

trans-unit.target: Échec de validation de l'achat
trans-unit.note: Title of the dialog displayed in cases that validation of the IAP purchase has failed at the MEGA License server

trans-unit.source: The account that created this link has been terminated due to multiple violations of our Terms of Service.
trans-unit.target: Le compte qui a créé ce lien à été annulé à la suite de plusieurs violations de nos conditions générales d'utilisation.
trans-unit.note: Error message shown when you open a file/folder link (or other shared resource) and it's no longer available because the the associated user account has been terminated due to multiple violations of our Terms of Service.

trans-unit.target: Échec de téléchargement
trans-unit.note: Title of the dialog displayed when the process/request to download a node failed - (String as short as possible).

trans-unit.source: Could not download the folder link. Please try again.
trans-unit.target: Impossible de téléchareger le lien de dossier. Veuillez ressayer.
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when fails the process/request to download a folder link.

trans-unit.note: Title of the dialog displayed when fails the process/request to import a node - (String as short as possible).

trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when fails the process/request to import a folder link.

trans-unit.source: This e-mail address has already registered an account with MEGA.
trans-unit.target: Un compte MEGA a déjà été créé avec cette adresse courriel.
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog shown when the users tries to create an account with an email already in use.

trans-unit.source: The account confirmation link that you are using is incomplete. Please check the link length and be sure that you have copied the entire link then try again.
trans-unit.target: Le lien de confirmation de compte que vous utilisez est incomplet. Veuillez vérifier la longueur du lien, vous assurer d'avoir copié le lien entier et ressayer.
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when a user try to confirm a MEGA account but the confirm link is incomplete because it has less characters than it should (probably because the user hasn't copied and pasted the entire link).

trans-unit.source: The link you are using for a new signup is not valid.
trans-unit.target: Le lien que vous utilisez pour une nouvelle adhésion est invalide.
trans-unit.note: Message of the warning dialog shown when the user tries to make a new sign up using an invalid link (#newsignup).

trans-unit.source: Your account has been blocked. Please contact support@mega.co.nz
trans-unit.target: Votre compte a été bloqué. Veuillez contacter support@mega.co.nz
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog shown when the user is trying to login and the account has been blocked.

trans-unit.source: Your account has not been confirmed yet.
trans-unit.target: Votre compte n'a pas encore été confirmé.
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog shown when the user is trying to login and the account has not been confirmed yet.

trans-unit.source: You have attempted to log in too many times. Please wait until {0} and try again.
trans-unit.target: Vous avez tenté de vous connecter trop de fois. Veuillez patienter jusqu'à {0} et ressayer.
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog shown when the user is trying to login and has made several failed attempts. Preserve the {0} code because is for include the exact time until the user has to wait.

trans-unit.target: Compte bloqué
trans-unit.note: Title of the dialog shown when the user is trying to login and the account has been blocked.

trans-unit.source: Failed to share item(s) from MEGA. The destination application seems busy. Please try again later.
trans-unit.target: Échec de partage des éléments de MEGA. L'application de destination semble occupée. Veuillez ressayer plus tard.
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when the process to share item(s) from MEGA with other app fails because the destination app is busy.

trans-unit.source: There is an unknown error in the download path. Please try again and if it continues to fail, please contact support@mega.nz. [{0}]
trans-unit.target: Une erreur inconnue est présente dans le chemin de téléchargement. Veuillez ressayer. Si l'échec persiste, contactez support@mega.nz. [{0}]
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when the process/request to download a file/folder failed because an unknown error in the download path. Preserve the [{0}] code because is for include the error code or the error message in runtime.

trans-unit.source: The file/folder of the link that you are trying to open was not found. You are probably logged in to a different account. Please, log in to the correct account and try again.
trans-unit.target: Le fichier ou dossier du lien que vous tentez d'ouvrir n'a pas été trouvé. Vous êtes probablement connecté à un compte différent. Veuillez vous connecter au bon compte et ressayer.

trans-unit.note: Title of the dialog displayed when trying to open a link of an internal node and this node is not found in the account in which the user is logged in - (String as short as possible).
